short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can access subreddits directly from the google search bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Lazy Redditor extension streamlines your Reddit browsing experience by allowing quick access to any subreddit directly from Chrome's omnibox. With just a few keystrokes, you can visit your favorite communities without the hassle of typing the full URL. Simply type r into the address bar, press Tab, and enter the name of the subreddit you want to visit, such as AskReddit, gaming, or news. Once you hit Enter, the extension will automatically redirect you to the corresponding subreddit on Reddit, saving you time and effort.

This extension is perfect for avid Reddit users who frequently jump between subreddits or discover new communities. Whether you want to explore discussions, follow trending topics, or dive deep into niche communities, Reddit Subreddit Shortcut makes it incredibly simple. It's designed for lazy Redditors and power users alike, providing a seamless, faster way to browse Reddit without needing to type out reddit.com/r/ every time.

Take the hassle out of subreddit navigation and make browsing smoother, faster, and more efficient with Lazy Redditor!
